name: 惊险极速
description:
惊险极速:3

This is a simple mode to operate various vehicles to rush to the end by any means (or destroy all other players)

You can go directly to the matching stage, and there will be, for example,

High performance sports cars, modified armed vehicles, military armored vehicles and even tanks can be selected,

Each car has different performance. There will be one or more skills to prepare for a rainy day, or to turn the situation around at a critical moment

Of course, the higher the rental index, the more powerful the car will cost more gold coins

Each time you win (there is one and only one winner), you will win the rent of all other players as a bonus.

However, they will not return their rent, so sometimes the most expensive car is not the most economical choice.

There will be only online networking mode

The official version of the map will include the standard version of island, desert, city, etc

Different from ordinary racing games

More inclined to escape mode, does not limit the path to the end, and can take a variety of means
